title: How does eye contact affect attraction and fascination in conversation?
first_phrase: This text explores the role of eye contact in attraction and fascination in interpersonal communication. Studies have shown that prolonged eye contact can increase engagement and emotional connection between two individuals. Furthermore, researchers have found that dilated pupils make a person more attractive and appealing to others. Additionally, the text touches on the connection between anger and fascination.
